#summary System Requirements
#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Support

= Required =

  * .NET Framework 2.0
  * Windows 2000 or higher (except Me)
  * 10 MB Of RAM
  * 2.5 MB Of Free Disk Space
  * Krypton Toolkit 2.7.1 and higher

= Recommended =

  * .NET Framework 2.0 and 3.5
  * Windows XP/Vista
  * 15 MB Of RAM
  * 3 MB Of Free Disk Space
  * Microsoft Visual C# 2005 Express Edition
  * Krypton Toolkit 2.7.1 or higher
